response.overview: The life story of a Bengali fan of megastar Mammootty..This story is nestled in the picturesque countryside of Kotapuram which is not highly developed but has its own rustic beauty and rich cultural heritage. The people residing followed the traditional way, rituals and beliefs to the core of their heart. As being this, a beverage shop was started first which created a dispute among people as some wanted this and others didn't. During this time a Bengali enters into this place and he is the hero of the movie who tries to solve the disputes and gives solutions in a structured way giving a colourful essence with comedy and mixture of other emotions to the movie and making it a family entertainer . â€”Joby Vayalunkal
